cellularAutomata
Class AbstractCAFactory

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.AbstractCAFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
CAFactory
public abstract class AbstractCAFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Creates sets of related objects that work together to create a particular type of CA. For example, it might produce a two-dimensional lattice, the "Life" rules, and a two-dimensional graphics engine. Or it might produce a one-dimensional lattice, rule 60, and a one-dimensional graphics engine.
Currently (August 2005), there is only one concrete factory, but this may change. This class provides a simple mechanism for adding additional factories.

Author:
David Bahr

Method Detail

getDataStorage

public abstract FileStorage getDataStorage()
Gets an appropriate mechanism for storing data.

Returns:
An object with data storage routines (for example, one-dimensional with each row storing another generation).

getLattice

public abstract Lattice getLattice()
Gets the CA lattice.

Returns:
A lattice (for example, two-dimensional).

getGraphicsPanel

public abstract LatticeView getGraphicsPanel()
Gets the panel that draws the CA.

Returns:
The panel that draws the CA (does not include any other graphics such as the control panel).

getRule

public Rule getRule()
Gets the CA rules.

Returns:
The rules by which a CA evolves (for example, the one-dimensional rule number 102).
